title: Reall persecution or, The foundation of a general toleration, displaied and portrayed by a proper emblem, and adorned with the same flowers wherewith the scoffers of this last age have strowed their libellous pamphlets. Collected out of several books of the sectaries to discover to world their wicked and abusive language against godly Presbyterian ministers.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for J[ohn] H[ancock] and are to be sold in Popes head Alley,
